org.trimou.handlebars

Interface Helper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurationAware
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHelper, AbstractTimeFormatHelper, AlternativesHelper, AsyncHelper, BasicSectionHelper, BasicValueHelper, BasicHelper, CacheHelper, DateTimeFormatHelper, EachHelper, EmbedHelper, EqualsHelper, EvalHelper, FormatHelper, ChooseHelper, ChooseHelper.OtherwiseHelper, ChooseHelper.WhenHelper, IfHelper, IncludeHelper, InvokeHelper, IsHelper, JoinHelper, LocaleAwareValueHelper, LogHelper, NullCheckHelper, NumberIsEvenHelper, NumberIsOddHelper, NumberMatchingHelper, NumericExpressionHelper, RepeatHelper, ResourceBundleHelper, SetHelper, SwitchHelper, SwitchHelper.CaseHelper, SwitchHelper.DefaultHelper, TagHelper, TimeFormatHelper, UnlessHelper, WithHelper
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Helper
extends ConfigurationAware
    Handlebars-like helper. Must be thread safe.

    Class member names in this package sometimes do not make much sense (e.g. Options.fn()), however we've tried to follow the original handlebars terminology as much as possible.

    Since:
    1.5
    Author:
    Martin Kouba
    See Also:
    MustacheEngineBuilder.registerHelper(String, Helper)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute(Options options)
      Execute the helper.
      default void validate(HelperDefinition definition)
      Helper should validate the tag definition (e.g. number of parameters) during compilation and fail fast if necessary.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.trimou.engine.config.ConfigurationAware

        getConfigurationKeys, init

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute(Options options)
        Execute the helper.
        Parameters:
        options -
        Throws:
        IOException

      • validate

        default void validate(HelperDefinition definition)
        Helper should validate the tag definition (e.g. number of parameters) during compilation and fail fast if necessary. A MustacheException with code MustacheProblem.COMPILE_HELPER_VALIDATION_FAILURE should be thrown in case of validation failure occurs.
        Parameters:
        definition -
